useCase.name: Manage Content Strategy
useCase.description: As a Content Designer, I want to plan and implement content strategy for the project.

preconditions.precondition: Content Designer identified a need for content strategy planning.

useCase.trigger: User story or project requirements indicate the need for content strategy planning.

mainSequence.step: Explore existing content types with CMS to gather information.
Request content guidelines and editorial plan from Documentation.
Request participation in strategy meetings from Project Team.
Participate in Content Strategy Meeting and contribute insights.
Formulate recommendations with the help of Recommendations.
Update CMS based on recommendations received from Team.
Update documentation after confirming changes with Docs.
